name: Devil's Handshake
description:
Daisies are evil hellspawns that must burn; eradicate all of them to pass each level.

Controls:

Up (or W)  -  Activate upper hand
Down (or S)  -  Activate lower hand
Left (or A)  -  Activate left hand
Right (or D)  -  Activate right hand

Hold Space   -   Enter jettison mode
Space + Arrows (or WASD) -  Jettison an arm from the given direction

Z  -  Undo a move
X/Y  -  Redo a move
R  -  Restart level
Esc  -  Quit game

NOTE: Game currently does not have a save function, but you can use the "<" and ">" keys to change levels to get back to where you left off (or even skip a level you're stuck on)

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (Theme: Joined Together)
...at least it would have been if I finished in time...
